value.stringValue: IF(LEN(TEXT([Lead].LeadSource))!=0, "Lead source: " + Text([Lead].LeadSource) & BR(), "" ) & IF(LEN([Lead].Project_Name__c )!=0, "Project name: " + [Lead].Project_Name__c & BR(), "") & IF(LEN([Lead].Project_Description__c)!=0, "Project description: " + [Lead].Project_Description__c & BR(), "") & IF(LEN(TEXT([Lead].New_Application_Type__c ))!=0, "Application: " + TEXT([Lead].New_Application_Type__c) & BR(), "") & IF(LEN(TEXT([Lead].Annual_Quantity__c))!=0, "Planned annual quantity: " + TEXT([Lead].Annual_Quantity__c) & BR(), "") & IF(LEN(TEXT([Lead].Date_Production__c ))!=0, "Production start: " + TEXT([Lead].Date_Production__c) & BR(), "" ) & IF(LEN([Lead].Products_Of_Interest__c)!=0, "Product of interest: " + [Lead].Products_Of_Interest__c & BR(), "") & IF(LEN([Lead].Request__c )!=0, "Request: " + [Lead].Request__c, "")

formulas.name: formula_52_myRule_50_A1_0376523850
formulas.expression: IF(LEN(TEXT({!myVariable_current.LeadSource}))!=0, "Lead source: " + Text({!myVariable_current.LeadSource}) & BR(), "" ) & IF(LEN({!myVariable_current.Project_Name__c} )!=0, "Project name: " + {!myVariable_current.Project_Name__c} & BR(), "") & IF(LEN({!myVariable_current.Project_Description__c})!=0, "Project description: " + {!myVariable_current.Project_Description__c} & BR(), "") & IF(LEN(TEXT({!myVariable_current.New_Application_Type__c} ))!=0, "Application: " + TEXT({!myVariable_current.New_Application_Type__c}) & BR(), "") & IF(LEN(TEXT({!myVariable_current.Annual_Quantity__c}))!=0, "Planned annual quantity: " + TEXT({!myVariable_current.Annual_Quantity__c}) & BR(), "") & IF(LEN(TEXT({!myVariable_current.Date_Production__c} ))!=0, "Production start: " + TEXT({!myVariable_current.Date_Production__c}) & BR(), "" ) & IF(LEN({!myVariable_current.Products_Of_Interest__c})!=0, "Product of interest: " + {!myVariable_current.Products_Of_Interest__c} & BR(), "") & IF(LEN({!myVariable_current.Request__c} )!=0, "Request: " + {!myVariable_current.Request__c}, "")

value.stringValue: AND( ISPICKVAL([Lead].LeadSource, "u-shop order"), NOT(ISBLANK([Lead].Email)), ISNEW(), OR( ISPICKVAL([Lead].uB_Office__c , "Hongkong"), ISPICKVAL([Lead].uB_Office__c , "Taiwan"), ISPICKVAL([Lead].uB_Office__c , "Rest of APAC"), ISPICKVAL([Lead].uB_Office__c , "Korea"), ISPICKVAL([Lead].uB_Office__c , "Japan"), ISPICKVAL([Lead].uB_Office__c , "China")) )
